name: Hot Scientific Clock
description:
"Welcome to the Elite Class!"

Jikan attends a special school that no one can get into--unless of course, you have an elite ability.  And Jikan's got an ability suitable for his namesake! But can he capture the heart of Nanji or Toki, one being a girl he fails to impress, the other his childhood friend?

It is time!

FEATURES:
- Fully voiced dialogue
- A cool dude as an MC
- 2 lovely heroines
- 4 endings
- ED video
- Completely free!
- No adult content ^^

- RESOURCE CREDITS -
List of free-to-use resources used in the game

Sprite art by Crescent Moon Arpeggio
Bell SFX from freesound.org by user 13FPanska_Stranska_Michaela
Music track by Kevin MacLeod
Ending song by Trial and Error
BGs & Clock from Pixabay
Logo lettering made with cooltext
